SELECT rn, subquery.question_no, subquery.product_no, subquery.question_title, subquery.question_text, subquery.answer_status, subquery.question_date, subquery.question_user_id, subquery.answercnt, subquery.product_title, subquery.owner_id FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(q pk_question) */ rownum rn, q.question_no, q.question_title, q.question_text, q.answer_status, q.question_date, q.user_id AS question_user_id, q.answercnt, p.product_no, p.product_title, p.owner_id FROM question q JOIN product_tbl p ON q.product_no = p.product_no WHERE p.owner_id = #{user_id} AND q.answer_status = #{status} AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) subquery WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
